# scrollIntoView

Scrolls the specified element into view.

## Parameters

| Param               | Type       | Description                                                           |
| ------------------- | ---------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| element             | `Element`  | the element to scroll.                                                |
| options             | `Object`   | the scroll options.                                                   |
| options.alignBottom | `boolean`  | whether the element should be aligned to the bottom of its container. |
| options.smooth      | `boolean`  | whether to animate the scrolling.                                     |
| options.duration    | `number`   | the duration of the animation, default: 150ms.                        |
| options.done        | `function` | invoked after scrolling.                                              |

## Example

```js
import {useCallback} from 'react';
import {scrollIntoView} from '@bluecateng/pelagos';

const Example = () => {
	const handleClick = useCallback(() => scrollIntoView(document.getElementById('other')), []);
	return <button onClick={handleClick}>...</button>;
};
```
